constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All applications for developments likely to attract birds or connected with an aviation use.Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Removal of hip bonnet to be replaced with gable wall, new rear box dormer, Installation of two number front elevation roof light windows and one high level side elevation bathroom window.
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the materials for the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with condition B2.(a), Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
